metadata.name: Phunks Artists Spotlight #1 - The Pariah
metadata.description: The Pariah is an NFT collection paying respects to the classic era of graphic novels, manga, and comic art. Set in a fictional dystopian city of tomorrow, local residents live in fear of person known simply as The Pariah. The collection consists of 2,222 unique vignettes and has innvoative smart contract features to allow a powerfel and feature rich future. The open edition is a gift for the love and support the Phunks community has shown me as both a collector and a contributor. Be Phree (its free) and Be Phunky!
